start.text: Alright boys, time to bag ourselves a hero!
I crawled out of my grave to put you in yours.
God, oh god, I need a kill today.

start_boss.text: I needed a new wall mount.
What do you think is the mileage on that thing?
Sir, it's heading right for us...
It'll die like the rest of them.

retreat.text: Let's see if we make it back.

out_of_missiles.text: Of all the- Command, we need a resupply.

need_help.text: Gonna need some help if you want them dead.

pursuing.text: Won't be waking up from this.
Clean sweep, boys, we don't want stragglers.
Well would you look at that, a free meal.
You know the drill, no survivors.
Been here before, just like how it used to be.

running.text: Can't let you take me alive. But I'm not dying either.
I'll be back for you, later.
I'm leaving this up to you.

hull_90.text: Need to try harder than that.

hull_50.text: Can you give as good as you get?

hull_30.text: Stronger men than you have died trying to kill me.
I'm going to shove a rock in your exhaust port.
I didn't survive the shutdown to die to the likes of you.

overload.text: We're like fish in a barrel!

death.text: So this is how it ends.

victory.text: And now, the best part of the job.
And now to find the guy who shot me.
